channel.title: CVE Feed for Foreman -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foreman -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-7078|2024-08-06T01:50:47.463Z -- foreman -- foreman
item.description: foreman before version 1.15.0 is vulnerable to an information leak through organizations and locations feature. When a user is assigned _no_ organizations/locations, they are able to view all resources instead of none (mirroring an administrator's view). The user's actions are still limited by their assigned permissions, e.g. to control viewing, editing and deletion.

item.title: CVE-2016-7077|2024-08-06T01:50:47.449Z -- foreman -- foreman
item.description: foreman before 1.14.0 is vulnerable to an information leak. It was found that Foreman form helper does not authorize options for associated objects. Unauthorized user can see names of such objects if their count is less than 6.

item.title: CVE-2016-9595|2024-08-06T02:59:02.231Z -- foreman -- katello-debug
item.description: A flaw was found in katello-debug before 3.4.0 where certain scripts and log files used insecure temporary files. A local user could exploit this flaw to conduct a symbolic-link attack, allowing them to overwrite the contents of arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2014-0091|2024-08-06T09:05:38.172Z -- foreman -- foreman
item.description: Foreman has improper input validation which could lead to partial Denial of Service
